children.name:
Do Rest∷
p.ok = max_recharge
ndays += 1
zd.send (eh=eh, port="", datum=zd.new_datum_string (fmt.aprintf ("p=%v m=%v ndays=%v\n", p, m, ndays)), causingMessage=msg)
⇒
